original_text: For the promise to Abraham and his offspring that he would be heir of the world did not come through the law but through the righteousness of faith.
korean_text: 아브라함이나 그 후손에게 세상의 상속자가 되리라고 하신 언약은 율법으로 말미암은 것이 아니요 오직 믿음의 의로 말미암은 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For the promise to Abraham and his offspring
that he would be heir of the world
did not come through the law
but through the righteousness of faith.
